title: Everything You Need for a Great Stay
description: We've thought of everything to make your backpacking experience comfortable and memorable

services.name: Free High-Speed WiFi
services.description: Stay connected with reliable internet throughout the hostel, perfect for remote work or sharing your travel moments.

services.name: Fully Equipped Kitchen
services.description: Save money by cooking your own meals. Full-size refrigerator, stove, microwave, and all utensils provided.

services.name: Laundry Facilities
services.description: Washing machines and dryers available 24/7. Detergent provided or purchase on-site.

services.name: Luggage Storage
services.description: Free storage for your bags before check-in or after check-out. Explore the city hands-free!

services.name: Airport Transfer
services.description: Convenient shuttle service to and from the airport. Book in advance for discounted rates.

services.name: Free Daily Breakfast
services.description: Start your day right with continental breakfast including fresh fruit, coffee, tea, and local specialties.

services.name: 24/7 Security
services.description: Feel safe with round-the-clock security, keycard access, and individual lockers in every room.

services.name: Local Tours & Info
services.description: Our staff knows the city inside out. Get insider tips, maps, and book local tours at reception.

services.name: Social Events
services.description: Weekly pub crawls, walking tours, and social nights to help you meet fellow travelers.

services.name: Games & Entertainment
services.description: Common room with games, books, movies, and a place to relax and socialize with other guests.

services.name: Bike Rental
services.description: Explore the city on two wheels! Affordable bike rentals with locks and maps included.

services.name: 24/7 Reception
services.description: Our friendly staff is always available to help with bookings, directions, or any questions you might have.
